thread.title: Delia Cook
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Delia Cook

author: Delia Cook
title: Delia Cook
text: The service was done very quickly the car was picked up nice and early and came back when it was supposed to come back. The cost was reasonable considering the work that needed doing and the guys that I dealt with were polite and charming . I would've given the overall experience five stars however I was surprised to find that included in my bill was a Â£25 deposit for next years service. This I didn't realise had been taken until afterwards and I received the email to tell me. Other than that it was a good job, great staff, great experience .
